text: Ia atrivibar kuabar tuziba ko, mɨdorozir gumazibar faragha zuir gumaziba ko mɨdorozir gumaziba ko, hoziabar kuabar tuziba ko dagh apiazir gumazibar kuabar tuzibar amam. Egh ia gumaziba bar men kuabar tuzibar amam, pura ingangarir gumazir kɨniba ko gumazir fɨriaghreziba, ko pura gumaziba ko gumazir ziaba itiba!”
